charges.charge_description: 18:1951 and 18:2 - Conspiracy to commit Hobbs Act robberty and aiding and abetting.  (Superseding Indictment filed 8/28/2013)(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 300 months. This term of imprisonment consists of 240 months on Count 1 and 60 months on Counts 3 and 5, to be served concurrently with each other and consecutively to Count 1. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 years. This term of supervised release consists of 3 years on each of Counts 1, 3 and 5, all counts to run concurrently. Special Assessment: $300. Restitution: $5,105.77.

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 207 months. This term of imprisonment consists of 87 months on Count 3 and 10 years on Count 4, to be served consecutively to Count 3. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 years.
